s0001.literal: Emperor Jing the Filial was Emperor Wen's crown prince.
s0001.idiomatic: Emperor Jing the Filial was Emperor Wen's crown prince.

s0003.literal: In the seventh year, sixth month, Emperor Wen passed away.
s0003.idiomatic: In the seventh year, sixth month, Emperor Wen passed away.

s0004.literal: 丁未，太子即皇帝位，尊皇后曰皇太后。
s0004.idiomatic: On the day Dingwei, the crown prince ascended the imperial throne and honored the Empress as Empress Dowager.

s0005.idiomatic: He granted the people nobility ranks of one level.

s0006.literal: 元年冬十月，丞相申屠嘉薨。
s0006.idiomatic: First year, winter, tenth month, Chancellor Shen Tu Jia passed away.

s0008.literal: 十二月，丞相開封侯陶青取代。
s0008.idiomatic: Twelfth month, Chancellor Marquis of Kaifeng Tao Qing succeeded him.

s0009.idiomatic: Spring, first month, he established Empress Wang.

s0011.idiomatic: Summer, fourth month, granted amnesty to the world.

s0012.idiomatic: Sixth month, Chancellor Tao Qing was dismissed.

s0014.idiomatic: Autumn, seventh month, granted amnesty to the world.

s0015.literal: 八月，丞相桃侯劉舍為丞相。
s0015.idiomatic: Eighth month, Marquis of Tao Liu She became Chancellor.

s0016.idiomatic: Ninth month, granted amnesty to the world.

s0017.idiomatic: Second year, spring, second month, granted amnesty to the world.
